recipe_name: Lemon cheescake with chocolate and ginger sauce
author: James Tanner
method: Using a fiveiinch chefs' ring, press the crushed macaroons into the bottom to make a base. Mix together the ricotta, lemon and icing sugar. Fill the chefs'  ring to the top and level off neatly. To make the sauce, melt together the cream and chocolate in a small saucepan over a low heat. Once the chocolate has melted, stir in the ginger. Remove the chefs' ring and serve the cheesecake with orange slices, chocolate sauce and mint leaves.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz ready mademacaroons, crumbled,  ½ tub ricotta,  zest and juice of half a lemon,  1 tsp icing sugar,  200ml double cream,  50g/1¾oz chocolate,  small piece root ginger, peeled and grated,  ½ orange, sliced,  fresh mint leaves, to garnish
